price: Igihe baboheshejwe iminyororo mw’izosi, maze bakaboheshwa n’amapingu ku maguru, bagaheza bakabururwa n’abamalayika “Al-Zabaaniya” bacungereye umuriro;
arabic: إِذِ ٱلۡأَغۡلَٰلُ فِيٓ أَعۡنَٰقِهِمۡ وَٱلسَّلَٰسِلُ يُسۡحَبُونَ

meta.transliteration: idhi al-aghlālu fī aʿnāqihim wal-salāsilu yus'ḥabūna
